measure.CatchLine: Requires the Housing and Community Services Department to award loans for the predevelopment costs of affordable housing Requires the Housing and Community Services Department to award loans for the predevelopment costs of affordable housing [<i>and a grant to assist nonprofits receiving grants or loans under this Act.
measure.MeasureSummary: Digest: This Act makes OHCS provide loans for costs of low cost housing predevelopment. (Flesch Readability Score: 69.9). [Digest: This Act creates a temporary program for OHCS to award grants and loans for housing prep. (Flesch Readability Score: 74.2).] Requires the Housing and Community Services Department to award [grants] loans for the predevelopment costs of affordable housing [and a grant to assist nonprofits receiving grants or loans under this Act. Sunsets January 2, 2028]. Requires the department to adopt initial rules by June 1, 2026, and to combine other existing predevelopment loan programs. [Establishes the Affordable Housing Predevelopment Loan Fund. Continuously appropriates moneys in the fund to the department to award loans for predevelopment costs of affordable housing.] [Appropriates moneys from the General Fund to the department for grants and loans.] Declares an emergency, effective on passage.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to affordable housing; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to affordable housing; and declaring an emergency.

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Housing and Homelessness with subsequent referral to Ways and Means.
Public Hearing held.
Work Session held.
Recommendation: Do pass with amendments, be printed A-Engrossed, and subsequent referral to Ways and Means be rescinded.
Subsequent referral to Ways and Means rescinded by order of the Speaker.
Second reading.
Third reading. Carried by Gamba. Passed.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 37; Nays, 16--Boshart Davis, Diehl, Drazan, Elmer, Harbick, Helfrich, Levy B, Lewis, McIntire, Osborne, Reschke, Scharf, Skarlatos, Smith G, Wallan, Yunker; Excused, 4--Cate, McDonald, Nguyen H, Walters; Excused for Business of the House, 3--Evans, Owens, Sanchez.

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Housing and Development.
Public Hearing held.
Work Session held.
Recommendation: Do pass the A-Eng. bill.
Second reading.
Carried over to 06-02 by unanimous consent.
Carried over to 06-03 by unanimous consent.
Carried over to 06-04 by unanimous consent.
Carried over to 06-05 by unanimous consent.
Carried over to 06-09 by unanimous consent.
Carried over to 06-10 by unanimous consent.
Carried over to 06-11 by unanimous consent.
Carried over to 06-12 by unanimous consent.
Third reading.  Carried by Patterson.  Passed.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 24; Nays, 4--Bonham, Girod, Linthicum, Robinson; Excused, 2--Nash, Starr.

historyActions.ActionText: Speaker signed.
President signed.
Governor signed.
Chapter 380, (2025 Laws): Effective date June 24, 2025.
